DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigate effect Ginseol Kg1 ( Korea red ginseng extract ) blood pressure prehypertensive stage I hypertensive patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ginseol Kg1 Blood Pressure Lowering
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind study . At end initial 2-week washout period , patient fulfil inclusion criterion assign three group , i.e . control group ( placebo ) , low dose Ginseol Kg1 group ( 100mg ) , high dose Ginseol Kg1 ( 300mg ) group . They intake study drug 8 week . 24-h ambulatory BP monitoring ( ABPM ) pulse wave velocity measure end washout period 8 week active treatment . At visit , seat SBP DBP , heart rate , use concomitant medication spontaneously report adverse event record . Compliance medication ( determine counting return tablet ) evaluate visit .
DOC.criteria: Age : Adults 20 year Prehypertension stage 1 hypertension ( systolic blood pressure 120~159mmHg diastolic blood pressure 80~99mmHg ) Subject take medication treat hypertension within 15 day prior first visit Subject involve clinical trial within 30 day prior first visit Subject follow disease within 2 year prior screen : angina pectoris , myocardial infarction , heart failure , peripheral vascular disease , chronic liver failure , chronic renal failure , diabetes mellitus , hyperthyroidism , hypothyroidism , malignant tumor , mental disease Systolic blood pressure ≥ 160mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≥ 100 mmHg screen period Subject hepatic dysfunction ( AST , ALT ≥ 2.5 time higher normal value ) Subject renal dysfunction ( creatinine ≥ 1.5 time higher normal value ) Subject pregnant breast feed Alcoholic Subject allergy ingredient study product
